name: The Eye's Embrace (DEMO)
description:
[THIS IS AN 18+ ADULT HORROR GAME.]

DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR INTERRACT WITH THIS GAME IF YOU ARE UNDER THE AGE OF 18.

[THIS IS A DEMO VERSION.]  Please stay tuned for the full game!

All content in this demo is subject to change. Backgrounds in this demo are temporary and will be changed for the full release. 

CONTENT WARNINGS

The demo includes:
Static/Flashing, Violence, Blood, Death, Suggestive Language, Emotional and Mental Abuse, Religious Themes and Cults

The full game will also include:
Body Horror, Gore, Sex and NSFW Imagery, Cannibalism, Stalking

You are a college student at Evergreen Hill University. Thanks to your best friend Axel, college life has never been so fun! Tonight, Axel is taking you to see the concert of a lifetime. Will the two of you hit it off, or will your night turn upside down?

THE EYE'S EMBRACE is a Horror Visual Novel game being co-created by drillthriller and ghost-realms. This game has been conceptualized by ghost-realms since 2018 and thanks to drillthriller's help, it's finally being made! A lot of inspiration for this game came from Gatobob's Boyfriend to Death series, Bram Stoker's Dracula, and Guillermo del Toro's Crimson Peak. This game is ONLY intended for players 18+.

GHOST-REALMS created Dex & Bram, as well as the lore, story, & worldbuilding. GHOST wrote Dex & Bram's dialogue, the death scenes, and death achievement titles.
DRILLTHRILLER created Axel, as well as the character sprites and  various CG's. DRILL coded the game, along with writing Axel, Bram, & MC's dialogue.
All endings, special events, and interactions were co-created by both creators and should not be credited to just one person.

[AXEL VESPERTINE]

The Seeker. 

[BRAM VESPERTINE]

The Watcher.

[DEXTER JONES]

The Bride.
